md:
giải nghĩa từ "assiduous" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Assiduous (adjective)

* Meaning: showing careful and steady attention to something over a long period of time
* Vietnamese: chăm chỉ, kiên trì, bền bỉ

Example sentence: She was assiduous in her research, spending hours every day studying and analyzing data.

Related words:

* Assiduity (noun): the quality of being assiduous
* Assiduousness (noun): the state of being assiduous
* Industrious (adjective): working hard and steadily
* Diligent (adjective): showing careful and steady attention to something
* Persevering (adjective): continuing to try hard despite difficulties or challenges
